definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: Mineral fibres are paid attention for their particular fibre structure.
sentences.chinese: 矿物纤维以其独特的纤维状结构越来越受重视。

sentences.english: Syntectonic fibrous pressure shadows are found in the Beilin syncline, the Western Hill, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京西山北岭向斜发育同构造纤维状压力影。

sentences.english: The delicate fiber-shaped structure recreates the interlacing shadows of the bamboo forest.
sentences.chinese: 微细纤维状造型，交错编织光影时空。

sentences.english: Vivacious perennial root is herbaceous base the ministry has palm Brown withered dead fiber shape is vaginal.
sentences.chinese: 多年生宿根草本基部有棕褐色枯死的纤维状叶鞘。

sentences.english: Stem erect, solid, striate, base clothedinfibrous remnant sheaths.
sentences.chinese: 茎直立，固体，具条纹，基部被纤维状残余鞘覆盖。

sentences.english: It is especially suitable to crush fibrous and lipidic material .
sentences.chinese: 特别适用于粉碎纤维状和带一定油脂的物料。

sentences.english: Conclusion: Cytotoxicity of fibrous mineral dusts was related to their surface properties.
sentences.chinese: 纤维状矿物粉尘对细胞膜毒性与其表面特性有关。

sentences.english: Dietary fiber is not necessarily fibrous in nature.
sentences.chinese: 膳食纤维在本质上不一定必须是纤维状的。

sentences.english: Barium carbonate crystal with fiber structure was prepared from malonic acid.
sentences.chinese: 以丙二酸做为调控剂，得到纤维状的碳酸钡晶体。
